website_summaries.verdict: The Pipo Max-M9 Pro is buoyed by a better-than-expected HD display, but spending just a little more can get you a much more polished Android tablet.
pros: Mini HDMI out and microSD card slot

customer_reviews.title: It has some cool features such as a USB host
customer_reviews.text: One star because the tablet works alright but the fact that the operating system has absolutely NO SUPPORT FROM THE COMPANY, no updates, is just a pain. THE WIFI CHIP STOPPED WORKING and now i have to use teathered internet which is somewhat convenient if you really need it. It has some cool features such as a USB host, with cable, Blue tooth, headphone jack. The power jack sucks. You need a separate cable for it. I think one star is the most i'd give it.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto G. Galache

customer_reviews.title: Worse tablet ever
customer_reviews.text: Worse tablet ever, had to root and rebuild it with other OS to get it to work. It is the slowest piece of junk ever. fully locks up every few days, does not keep a charge and I've come close to snapping it in 2 many many times. Have an ipad 1 that performs 10x better then this.
customer_reviews.author: P. Maher

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet Tons of Features
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet. Very good help at Freaktab.com on updating to custom rom's. Great buy and loaded with the latest options.
customer_reviews.author: Guitartek

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a better product. It's very sluggish and I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a better product. It's very sluggish and I have to wait very long for it to boot and also for it to load most apps.
customer_reviews.author: ohb1962

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: thought it was good but the charger says it's charging but its not. runs good other than that. Crashes sometimes too
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Great High spec tablet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: After buying the Ugt2 and its problem with the dim screen, after doing some research for fhd tablet I found this one on amazon after buying the tablet this tablet has peformed perfectlly with out no issuse this tablet has some exspansion option from usb host to hdmi out with no speacial adapter.
customer_reviews.author: NESISJOHN

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great. The only issue I have is that I am not able to easily find PIPO assessories like folios. So it seems generic is the way to go. Othervthan that, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was impressed with tablet overall , not as fast as i expected though
customer_reviews.author: djInvisible

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: EXPECTATIONS FULFILLED WITH MY TABLET TO BE A BRAND, THE TABLET RUNS WELL BUT SOMETIMES IS BLOCKED, BUT IS EASY TO FIX THE PROBLEM, I SAY NOT BE PERMITTED TO USER ROOT. EFFICIENT WITH SHIPPING, CAME BEFORE THE DATE INDICATED....
customer_reviews.author: LUIS FERNANDO ROA

customer_reviews.title: pipo m9 pro
customer_reviews.text: pros great screen wifi is good tablet is very responsive movies and videos are very good cons the tablet take to long to boot up
customer_reviews.author: jdmayo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy about it. Slow download. Had to buy a connector for 110 volts. Not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Awilda Rosario

customer_reviews.title: What a great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is quick shows no lag in anything I do. Got here as expected and still had enough charge left from customs to boot up and check it out. Gets good WIFI reception and is quick on the net. Later I may update this review but for now the tablets are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: lot of crashes
customer_reviews.text: this machine has a lot of crashes. sometimes it clicks link by it self. you hve to reset a lot. you pay what you gets . i am a little bit uneasy with it
customer_reviews.author: Oscar D. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Cannot leave ZERO stars, horrible piece of garbage !!! DO NOT BUY !!!
customer_reviews.text: !!! DO NOT BUY !!! Arrived defective, screen displays gray background with dark vertical lines when turned on. Worst product purchase from Amazon EVER !!! For the love of GOD what a watse of my time ! Ramos HuaKangBuy sent me a piece of JUNK period
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe product
customer_reviews.text: The product is unsafe. While charging the unit, it cracked open because of one of the batteries significantly bulging. If I had not removed the charger, the battery would possibly explode creating a fire hazard, and bodily injury. I believe the product is defective and should be recalled.
customer_reviews.author: boca raton

customer_reviews.title: POOR radios on this tablet
customer_reviews.text: The GPS hardly ever works except in a clear sky on a good day with no buildings around. The wifi radio works okay, but I notice even that drops out once in a while. Other than that, this is a great tablet for watching movies on the plane, checking email, etc. I love the big screen and the performance is good for the price. As long as you don't expect to use this for navigation you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Elf

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Horrible customer service. Lasted 2 weeks. NO WARRANTY at all. All of there products are not worth it. Buy from a local store and skip the headache. Save $300 bucks and do not make the same mistake I made.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sandhoefner

product_meta.title: PIPO M9 PRO GPS QUAD CORE Tablet PC 10.1 Inch 1920 x1200 High Resolution IPS Touch Screen RK3188 Quad Core 1.6GHz Android 4.2 GPS WiFI HDMI Dual Camera 2GB RAM 32GB.
product_meta.description: Description: PIPO M9 Pro Tablet PC have the advanced Android 4.2 operating system and the powerful RK3188 Quad Core processor.1920*1200 high resolution 10.1 inch big size IPS screen let you to enjoy high definition videos and movies. Model PIPO M9 Pro Tablet PC CPU RK3188 Quad Core CotexA9 1.6GHz GPU Quad Core OS Android4.2 Screen 10.1 inch IPS Capacitive touch screen Resolution 1920*1200 RAM 2G Capacity 32GB Camera Front is 2.0MP Dual Camera Back is 5.0MP Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n Gravity Sensor Support 3G Not built-in, support external 3G dongle Bluetooth Support Bluetooth 4.0 GPS Support Video WMV,RM,AVI,RMVB,MP4,MPG,MPEG, FLV Music MP3,WMA,FLAC,AAC,WAV,OGG Ebook TXT,etc Picture JPG,BMP,PNG,GIF,etc Language Multi-language Microphone Built-in microphone Speaker Built-in speaker I/O Port 1* Mini USB port 1* 3.5mm Earphone port 1* HDMI port 1* TF Card Port Battery 7600mAh 3.7V rechargable battery Product Size 248*173.6*10mm Product Weight 580g Package includes 1 x Tablet PC 1 x USB Cable 1 x Earphone
